name: Space Battle X
description:
Conquer alien races, establish outposts and play with and against others. You are a pilot of a ship that can battle aliens and establish mining operations, space stations, and planetary civilizations. All of which work to increase your power and influence over the galaxy.

This game was influenced by old school 80s, 8-bit type of arcade games but with the modern twist of an ongoing interactive universe. It has elements commonly seen in early arcade games, modern MMOs (Massively Multiplayer Online games) and colony/city building browser games all wrapped up in one unique experience.

https://spacebattlex.com
